lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Eishiro Saito, chairman of the Federation of Economic Organisations (Keidanren), urged Takeshita to succeed in unifying the ruling Liberal Democratic Party as soon as possible to tackle difficult tasks.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: However, expectations are high among major industries for new initiatives by Takeshita for immediate and effective measures to solve economic problems such as trade friction with the U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Behind those calls on Takeshita for prompt action are doubts about his capability in handling international issues due to his lack of experience in diplomacy, economists said.
